text:
“Why are we going for microservices?  Honestly I think it is partly because we care about what people think of us. Red Hat did a survey about Cloud Native drivers and one of them was career progression.  We want to be in with the cool crowd.”
#WTFIsCloudNative @holly_cummins

author.description: Editor In Chief at Container Solutions, host of the "Hacking the org" podcast, freelance tech writer, 1/2 of Twofish. I'd rather be making music.
author.name: Charles Humble (@charleshumble@mastodon.social)
